programme.title: The Secret Life of My Secretary Ep02

programme.desc: This Taiwanese talkshow features prominent experts, scholars and organizations in the discussion of current affairs, controversial political news, and events moving Taiwan and the world.

programme.title: Super Followers Ep146
programme.desc: Local superstar Jacky Wu and his daughter Sandy co-host for the first time, merging the best of variety and talk for an intellectual audience.

programme.title: CTI News Global Vision Ep112
programme.desc: This news update features international news events, special analyses and dialogues from public figures. Receive comprehensive and diverse perspectives of events moving the world today.

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Watch as rival kung-fu schools try to sabotage Fei-hung's superior Pao Chih Lin clinic until the chivalrous philanthropist shows them the error of their ways.

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: When an absent-minded nutty professor creates a 'Super Pill', a gang boss makes a play for it. Now, it's up to a fast-thinking super girl to save the day.

programme.title: Twin Blades of Doom
programme.desc: A man who left the martial world returns to action and goes on the road to vengeance after the evil Ghost Gang kills his parents.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: Directed by Lee Han-hsiang and starring Michael Hui, this blockbuster confirms Hui's versatile talents as the king of comedy.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: In this twisted comedy, a gambling game between a rookie con artist and an experienced flimflam man has life or death repercussions.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: An alluring female fairy seeks love among mortals and finds it in a man who takes care of an orphanage.

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Real-life champion martial artist Chen Kuan-Tai plays a powerful role in this action-packed saga where he fights for his true love.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: After a man's household pays dearly for his faith in his business rival, he turns to his swordmate and that man's son for help.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: Actress Lily Ho plays the feared swordswoman Silver Fox, who witnessed her father senseless maiming and her mother's rape. 18 years later, it's payback time.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: A detective's son's attempt to punish a swindler leads to him and his father having their own face-off. Starring Jimmy Wang Yu.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung woos a famous courtesan, indulges in some gambling and helps out earthquake victims while incognito in Suzhou.

programme.title: Song of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Cheng Pei Pei exchanges her martial arts weaponry for a syringe in this exotic contemporary drama by Pan Lei.

programme.title: 7-Man Army

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: A man (Alexander Fu Sheng) must learn several unique martial arts styles and compete in three trials before he can marry his beloved.

programme.title: Extraordinary Mission
programme.desc: An undercover cop attempts to take down a drug trafficking syndicate from the inside. However, his operation spirals out of control when he becomes an addict while trying to gain the leader's trust.

programme.title: Young & Fabulous

programme.title: Legend of Mysterious Agent

programme.title: The Bravest Escort Group
programme.desc: This historical drama follows a band of courageous bodyguards as they set out to escort the General Ma Bao's daughter Yuanyuan & her son - the Ming Dynasty's last hope, to safety.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: Yu Feng & Liang Liang's puppy is gravely injured while defending them from their neighbour's aggressive dog but sadly, the neighbour refuses to take responsibility.
